title: Triple Steamed Eggs
directions: Beat the eggs with the water, then stir in the salted eggs and century egg, as well as 1⁄2 teaspoon light soy sauce and a dash of white pepper.
Pour the mixture into a shallow bowl. Heat up a wok fitted with a steaming rack and filled with water over medium heat. Steam the egg for 10 minutes, until fully cooked.
To serve, top with 1⁄2 tablespoon light soy sauce and 1⁄2 teaspoon sesame oil.
ingredients: ½ teaspoon + ½ tablespoon light soy sauce
